title: Need help identifying a script
content:
Hello everyone!

I'm new to this site but I can already tell that this is a great site and is very helpful.

I need help identifying this script. I'm not sure if its a font or custom made, however I love the signature quality it has to it. It flows very nice, has hand-drawn features like at the end of certain letters you can see a slight "dab" of ink as if the pen was held down a little more to create this. I love those kind of features. It also has a jumpy/loopy quality almost like a 50s kind of script.

If anyone can help me identify this or something that is very similar, that would be very appreciated.

Thank you very much

JonE.

| --- | --- |

author: Jon Evenchen
